attributes.action: Vote of no confidence, calling for a referendum on early general elections in 21
attributes.additional_details: As a historically tory voter I have no faith in this government and I sense the mood of the public is the same..
attributes.background: Ask the people in the form of a referendum if they have faith in the current government or wish to hold early general elections as early as 2021.

rejection.details:
We can't accept petitions about appointments, which includes calling for Ministers to be sacked or for a vote of no confidence.

If you're concerned about a particular policy or decision that's the responsibility of Government or the House of Commons, you could sign or start a petition about that.

We have published the following petitions, which you might like to sign:

Hold an immediate general election: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/557074

Referendum on current restrictions and any further lockdowns: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/551539
